thread.title: Care resident put in scalding bath, lost toes.
thread.title_full: Care resident put in scalding bath, lost toes.

title: Care resident put in scalding bath, lost toes.
text: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-edinburgh-ea... Poor girl put in a scalding hot bath and unable to tell her carers due to learning difficulties. The pain must have been excruciating. "Nicola Jones, who has learning difficulties, sustained full thickness burns to 40% of her body and was left without any flesh on her ankles." Edited by BuzzBravado on Friday 23 October 11:02
